page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: {Domesday Project.By Alison and Katy. In our Domesday Project we have done all sorts of projects like housing, farming,local news,churches and Post Offices.Some children have been out interviewing some of the people in our village.We have been on walks along the lanes and taking photos of the country side. There are many farms and woods in our area. There are not very many roads,but the roads that are here can be busy with tractors and cars. There are many cottages and old houses in the village. There are about half a dozen thatched houses in the village so most of them have tiles or slate. There are two small rivers in our area called{the River Yeo and River {Mole.}Most of the land is steep and hilly.There is one school in our area which is our school.
